channel.title: New wield pos?
channel.description: im using easyrsc v1.1 i was wondering how\if possible you would go about making a ring wieldable along with a "full" set of armour ex-im wearing a large chain legs kite baxe guants amulet cape, i want to equip a ring now also i have given dragonstone ring stats\made it wieldable but when i click to wear it my amulet is replaced, i assume <wieldPos>11</wieldPos> is what needs to be changed, but just adding +1 and making it <wieldPos>12</wieldPos> causes the client to crash, im not sure what to do next, i am fairly noob at all this any help pointing me in the right direction is much appriecated thanks

item.title: New wield pos?
item.dc:creator: @oldskewl oldskewl
item.description:
@oldskewl wrote:

im using easyrsc v1.1
i was wondering how\if possible you would go about making a ring wieldable along with a “full” set of armour
ex-im wearing a large chain legs kite baxe guants amulet cape, i want to equip a ring now also
i have given dragonstone ring stats\made it wieldable but when i click to wear it my amulet is replaced, i assume 11 is what needs to be changed, but just adding +1 and making it 12 causes the client to crash, im not sure what to do next, i am fairly noob at all this any help pointing me in the right direction is much appriecated thanks
